package description: Two-dimensional implementation of Conway's Game of Life running in a three-dimensional environment with plane intersections.

cell types.cell description: Living cell active on the XY plane.
Living cell active on the YZ plane.
Living cell active on the ZX plane.
Dead cell active on the XY plane.
Dead cell active on the YZ plane.
Dead cell active on the ZX plane.
Active structural anchor. Connects intersecting planes to the XY plane via tags.
Active structural anchor. Connects intersecting planes to the YZ plane via tags.
Active structural anchor. Connects intersecting planes to the ZX plane via tags.
Active structural anchor active on all three planes (XY, YZ, ZX).
Dormant structural anchor waiting for neighbors on the XY plane.
Dormant structural anchor waiting for neighbors on the YZ plane.
Dormant structural anchor waiting for neighbors on the ZX plane.
Dormant universal anchor waiting for neighbors on all three planes.
